const TableInfo = (props) => { return ( {props.yearlyData.map((item, index) => ( ))}
Year Total Savings Interest (Year) Total Interest Invested Capital
{item.year} {item.savingsEndOfYear.toFixed(2)} {item.yearlyInterest.toFixed(2)} {item.savingsEndOfYear - props.initialInvestment - item.yearlyContribution * item.year} {props.initialInvestment + item.yearlyContribution * item.year}
); } export default TableInfo;
